Detailed Description

cvmx_usbdrd::_uctl_shim_cfg

This register allows configuration of various shim (UCTL) features. The fields XS_NCB_OOB_* are captured when there are no outstanding OOB errors indicated in INTSTAT and a new OOB error arrives. The fields XS_BAD_DMA_* are captured when there are no outstanding DMA errors indicated in INTSTAT and a new DMA error arrives.

This register is accessible only when USBDRD()_UCTL_CTL[H_CLK_EN] = 1.

This register can be reset by IOI reset or with USBDRD()_UCTL_CTL[UCTL_RST].
